title: Becoming Us
description: Skye sucks at being a sorcerer and two years at Hidden Academy doesn’t seem to have helped.With just her senior year left to go, her only focus is on not conjuring the dead who seem to want to take her to god knows where.But fate has other plans when she’s teamed up with a group of misfits. A group of very hot misfits. As dead bodies and secrets begin to pile up, she must learn to trust her new team.But will they trust her when her magic could destroy them all?Becoming Us is a slow burn reverse harem romance
author: K.  Swanson
